definition: to act like a spoiled child/to throw a tantrum/to act coquettishly

definition: to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
(typically followed by 就[jiu4]) apt to (lose one's temper, catch a cold etc)/at the drop of a hat
to do what one is told/obedient
to act stupid/to pretend to be naive
